table.name: shipment_cost
table.description: This table stores the breakdown of the cost associated with the accessorials in the shipment.

columns.name: SHIPMENT_COST_SEQNO
columns.description: A system-generated unique sequence number to define the shipment costs.

columns.name: SHIPMENT_GID
columns.description: The GID for the container group.

columns.name: COST_TYPE
columns.description: C, A, B

columns.name: COST
columns.description: The cost as it relegates to the cost type for the shipment.

columns.name: COST_GID
columns.description: The cost GID.

columns.name: COST_BASE
columns.description: The cost in base units.

columns.name: ACCESSORIAL_CODE_GID
columns.description: The accessorial code GID associated with the shipment cost.

columns.name: ACCESSORIAL_COST_GID
columns.description: The accessorial cost GID associated with the shipment cost.

columns.name: BILLABLE_INDICATOR_GID
columns.description: Indicates the billable status of this shipment cost (sell shipment only).

columns.name: RATE_GEO_COST_GROUP_GID
columns.description: The rate detail cost group GID associated with the shipment cost.

columns.name: RATE_GEO_COST_SEQ
columns.description: The rate detail cost sequence identifier associated with the shipment cost.

columns.name: SPECIAL_SERVICE_GID
columns.description: The special service GID associated with the shipment cost.

columns.name: IS_COST_FIXED
columns.description: Indicates shipment cost is a fixed cost.

columns.name: PROCESS_AS_FLOW_THRU
columns.description: The override for a record to be copied to the sell side during rating.

columns.name: ADJUSTMENT_REASON_GID
columns.description: The reason why this cost was added.

columns.name: GENERAL_LEDGER_GID
columns.description: The GL code for the shipment cost record.

columns.name: PAYMENT_METHOD_CODE_GID
columns.description: The payment method code for the shipment cost.

columns.name: EXCHANGE_RATE_DATE
columns.description: The date to be used for any currency conversions; if null, the latest conversion is used.

columns.name: EXCHANGE_RATE_GID
columns.description: The set of exchange rates to use for currency conversions; if null, the default set is used.

columns.name: COST_FN
columns.description: The functional currency amount for cost.

columns.name: COST_FN_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The functional amount currency GID.

columns.name: S_SHIP_UNIT_GID
columns.description: Points to the ship unit (if any) associated with this shipment cost, as a package.

columns.name: S_SHIP_UNIT_LINE_NO
columns.description: Points to the ship unit line (if any) associated with this shipment cost, as a package.

columns.name: IS_WEIGHTED
columns.description: Whether or not the cost affects the total weighted cost of the shipment only.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: COST_CATEGORY_GID
columns.description: The Cost Category Identifier associated with the Shipment Cost

columns.name: TRACKING_NUMBER
columns.description: Denotes the tracking number associated with a specific charge/cost.

columns.name: COST_IDENTIFIER
columns.description: It will be used to identify or describe a cost.
